TEI.2.document_title: Administration of estate of Samuel Dixon

barker_notes.barker_summary: Administration of estate of Samuel Dixon
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1205-1206

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Administration of estate of Samuel Dixon*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*The Estate of Samuel Dixon deceased To *person_mentioned*Alexander Kilpatrick*/person_mentioned* Dr *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1823">1823 October*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*To 1/2 of a horse held in *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*between *person_mentioned*Dixon*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Kilpatrick*/person_mentioned* which *person_mentioned*Dixon*/person_mentioned* converted to his own use_____________________ $12.50*/p*
*p*To 200 lbs of Bacon with one half of which *person_mentioned*Dixon*/person_mentioned* is chargeable at 25 cts per lb___________________________________________ 25.00*/p*
*p*To 1 Barrell of flour one half chargeable as aforesaid____________ 6. 00*/p*
*p*To 1 1/2 Bushels of salt at $3—4.50 one half chargeable as afd____ 2.25*/p*
*p*To an oven pot cups spoons and pack ropes______________________ 5.25*/p*
*p*$51. 00*/p*
*p*The above named *person_mentioned*Kilpatrick*/person_mentioned* with *person_mentioned*Dixon*/person_mentioned* came to the *location_mentioned*San Jacinto*/location_mentioned* from *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* in *date_mentioned n="08-xx-1823">August 1823*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Prior to leaving *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* they purchased in *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*Provisions and other articles together with a Boat in which they came to this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*-*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Dixon*/person_mentioned* in the *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1823"> fall of 1823*/date_mentioned* undertook surveying on the *location_mentioned*Brazos*/location_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Kilpatrick*/person_mentioned* accompanied him as *person_mentioned*Campkeeper*/person_mentioned*—On this Occasion the above account accrued—the whole of the *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*provisions being taken by *person_mentioned*Dixon*/person_mentioned* for the use of his *person_mentioned*hands*/person_mentioned*—An account has been furnished *person_mentioned*agt */person_mentioned*the *person_mentioned*Estate */person_mentioned*already This one is made out from the recollection of *person_mentioned*Kilpatrick*/person_mentioned* and to the truth of which he has sworn—*/p* *p**location_mentioned*Austins Colony*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*District of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* towit*/p*
*p*Personally appeared before me *person_mentioned*Laurence Richard Kenny*/person_mentioned* Alcalde of said District *person_mentioned*Alexr Kilpatrick*/person_mentioned* of this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*who being duly sworn says that the foregoing account as stated against the *person_mentioned*Estate of Saml Dixon*/person_mentioned* deceased is just and true and that the several articles composing the same were furnished by Deponent to sd *person_mentioned*Saml Dixon*/person_mentioned* in his lifetime and for which he has never received payment.*/p*
*p*Taken and acknowledged before me at the Town of *location_mentioned*San felipe de austin*/location_mentioned* in sd *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*this *date_mentioned n="09-21-1825">21 September 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Lauce Rich Kenny*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Alc*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Alex Kilpatrick*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Admitted and paid by *date_mentioned n="09-21-1825">Sept 21 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Recd a note from *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* for fifty one Dollars being for the amt of the within account against the *person_mentioned*Estate of Saml Dixon*/person_mentioned* which is in full for my claim on Said Estate*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-21-1825">Sept. 21 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Alex. Kilpatrick*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
